summary: Robert Taylor and Eleanor Parker star as a Kentucky backwoodsman and the woman who will NOT let anything interfere with her plans to marry him in this humorous romantic adventure through the American Frontier of 1798.
cast: Robert Taylor|Eleanor Parker|Victor McLaglen|Jeff Richards|Russ Tamblyn|James Arness|Alan Hale Jr.|John Hudson|Rhys Williams|Josephine Hutchinson|Sig Ruman|Rosemary DeCamp|Russell Johnson|Ralph Moody|Abel Fernandez|Dorothy Adams|Morris Ankrum|Robert Bice|Oscar Blank|Harry Cody|Gene Coogan|Billy Dix|Tom Fadden|Al Ferguson|Richard Garrick|Slim Gaut|William Haade|Lars Hensen|Louis Jean Heydt|Darryl Hickman|Jimmie Horan|Ethan Laidlaw|Rudy Lee|Betty Lynn|Joe McGuinn|Hank Patterson|Carl Pitti|Dick Rich|Phil Rich|George Robotham|Phil Schumacher|Russell Simpson|Chalky Williams|Marjorie Wood
title: La novia salvaje
